ctx: Ladjarji na žerjavici. Na kocki je veliko več kot plovba po Rdečem morju - Iran grozi z zapiranjem Gibraltarja
content:
Da ne bo odreagirala miljarda muslimanov na početje Izraela je bilo
naivno pričakovati. Vse sorte še bo (omenjeno ješe zaprtje
Gibraltarja...), če se tole pobijanje po dolgem in počez v Gazi ne
konča čimprej. Lep dan.
author: bigl

ctx: Ladjarji na žerjavici. Na kocki je veliko več kot plovba po Rdečem morju - Iran grozi z zapiranjem Gibraltarja
content:
Yemen's Iran-backed Houthi militia claimed responsibility for a
missile attack on Tuesday on a container ship in the Red Sea, and
for an attempt to attack Israel with drones.

Military spokesman for Yemen's Houthis: Houthi naval forces
"carried out a targeted operation against a commercial vessel, the
MSC United, using the appropriate naval missiles."

The ship was targeted after it refused 3 times to follow orders and
ignored repeated warnings
author: crt
